About Us

Welcome to Jan Seva Kendra, your one-stop solution for a wide range of government and utility services. Our mission is to provide fast, reliable, and accessible services to everyone in our community. We pride ourselves on ensuring that essential services are available to all, fostering convenience and trust.

Shop Name: Jan Seva Kendra

Owner Name: Tarun Kumar

Address: Opp. ESI Hospital, New Sharda Nagar, Saharanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India 247001

Mobile No: +91 8218171118

Why Choose Us?

At Jan Seva Kendra, we are committed to bridging the gap between citizens and essential services. From Aadhaar updates to utility bill payments, we ensure seamless processes, saving your time and effort.
